feed.title: Google Cloud: App Engine standard environment Go
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: App Engine standard environment Go

entry.summary: The Go 1.26 runtime is now available in preview for App Engine standard environment. This new runtime offers the latest features and performance improvements for your Go applications.
entry.title: Feature: Go 1.26 runtime now in preview

entry.content: Support for deploying your existing apps in the standard environment to Cloud Run using the gcloud beta app migrate-to-run command is in Preview. For more information, see Deploy an App Engine app in the standard environment to Cloud Run.
entry.summary: You can now migrate your existing apps in the App Engine standard environment to Cloud Run using the `gcloud beta app migrate-to-run` command. This new feature, currently in Preview, simplifies the deployment process. Find more details on how to migrate your App Engine apps to Cloud Run in the documentation.
entry.title: Feature: Migrate your apps to Cloud Run

entry.content: Go 1.11 is deprecated. You won't be able to deploy Go 1.11 applications, even if your organization previously used an organization policy to re-enable deployments of legacy runtimes. Your existing Go 1.11 applications will continue to run and receive traffic. We recommend that you migrate to the latest supported version of Go.
entry.summary: The Go 1.11 runtime is now deprecated and deployments are no longer permitted. Existing applications will continue to run, but migration to a supported Go version is strongly recommended.
entry.title: Deprecated: Go 1.11 runtime deprecated

entry.content: To increase security, starting in March 2025, support for Transport Layer Security (TLS) version 1.1 and earlier is deprecated. Update your application settings in the App Engine standard environment to use TLS version 1.2 and later, along with a corresponding secure set of cipher suites (Preview).
entry.summary: Secure your applications with TLS 1.2 or later.
entry.title: Feature: TLS 1.1 and earlier support deprecated

entry.content: Support for Go 1.25 runtime is in Preview. This runtime is available for early testers using existing release candidates.
entry.title: Feature: Go 1.25 Runtime Preview

entry.summary: The Go 1.24 runtime is now available in preview for App Engine Standard.
entry.title: Feature: Go 1.24 runtime now in preview
